### flextable

The flextable package provides a framework for easily create tables for reporting and publications. Tables can be embedded within: R Markdown documents with support for HTML, Word and PowerPoint documents. Microsoft Word or PowerPoint documents with package officer. Tables can also be rendered as R plots or graphic files (png, pdf and jpeg).
